title: Project Management - Get Milestone Sign-off
description: A project manager needs to get formal client sign-off for a major project milestone before proceeding to the next phase.

tasks.description: Prepare a milestone completion report demonstrating that all deliverables for the phase are complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, detailed report is created.

tasks.description: Send the report and a formal sign-off form to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives the necessary documents.

tasks.description: Receive the signed form from the client and update the project plan to mark the milestone as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The milestone is officially completed, and the next phase can begin.
